Police cordons erected around Napier Museum after discovery of strange bird-like ‘package’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-cordons-in-place-around-napier-museum-after-discovery-of-strange-bird-like-package/GF2VZOQHYFCBJOZK4ONN7Q6J3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-cordons-in-place-around-napier-museum-after-discovery-of-strange-bird-like-package/GF2VZOQHYFCBJOZK4ONN7Q6J3E/ By about 2pm, police determined the package posed no threat.
